Name: VCuber
About the game: === Control the light ball and crush the bricks ! === Nara the girl can destroy the bricks by hitting the light ball and controlling its direction of movement. Of course, the bricks may also counterattack, enemies may appear and block Nara, and even the rebounding ball will hurt Nara. Nara needs to dodge them and their bullets agilely, using the ball to clear all the bricks in the scene. Nara can strengthen her abilities with bricks and enemies falling crystals. The game uses physics engine to bring you a unique gaming experience.
